SEARCH
Package com.financial.services.expenses

Class BudgetExpenseLogicService

java.lang.Object
com.financial.services.expenses.BudgetExpenseLogicService
public class BudgetExpenseLogicService extends Object
Utility service providing stateless logic for filtering, searching, and aggregating BudgetExpense data.

    static long
    calculateSum(ArrayList<? extends BudgetExpense> expenses)
